questions.question_text: What is the formula for Committed Utilization?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
a is correct
Allocated hours: The number of hours that the resource is already committed. The value considers all resource plans and the hours on the user calendar, such as hours allocated for operational work or meetings across all projects and demands for group/user requested for selected resource plans.

questions.question_text: The Program Management application provides the following capabilities to the program manager (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
another wrong question correct answers are :

ABC
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-business-management/page/product/program-management/concept/c_ProgramManagement.html

Selected Answer: ABC
The it_program_manager role is essential to be able to manage programs. The Program Management application provides the following capabilities to the program manager:
Create a program by adding related projects and demands.
Create tasks specific to the program. These tasks are essential for completion of the program but are outside the scope of projects.
Define key milestones, anticipated risks, and issues for the program.
Monitor the progress and status and of all the projects and demand that are part of the program. Program manager can track the costs, resources, and schedules.
